oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relationship between nitrogen cycling and nitrous oxide emission in grass-clover pasture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ambus, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper reports on a work assessing the relationship between gross N transformations in grass-clover soils and emissions of nitrous oxide. By this manner, the source strength of the biogenic processes responsible for nitrous oxide production is evaluated.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Ambus, P. (2005) Relationship between nitrogen cycling and nitrous oxide emission in grass-clover pasture. Nutrient Cycling in Agroecosystems, 72, pp. 189-199.
